properties.name: genAiConfig.cacheTemplates
properties.description: Determines if prompt templates should be cached in memory.

properties.name: genAiConfig.enabled
properties.description: Flag to enable or disable the GenAi service.

properties.name: genAiConfig.recordEnabled
properties.description: Flag to enable recording of prompt responses as mocks.

properties.name: genAiConfig.recordFolder
properties.description: Folder path where recorded prompt responses (mocks) are stored.

properties.name: genAiConfig.batchFolder
properties.description: Folder path where batch submission and response files are stored.

properties.name: genAiConfig.batchMaxTokens
properties.description: Maximum total tokens per batch file.

properties.name: genAiConfig.batchApiEndpoint
properties.description: The OpenAI Batch API endpoint URL.
